backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data types and storing documents, model stats, distributions, and cleaning logs with reset and retrieval APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping feature IDs to involved frontend files, components, and test IDs for language toggle and report localization.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend pages, components, charts, and hooks for navigation, analysis, metrics, and visualization.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with OKLCH variables defining light and dark theme color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout with header/footer, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/BrandEmotionChar: React chart component aggregating and displaying emotion distribution per brand with empty-state handling and sanitized data.
frontend/src/components/CleaningLogPanel: Displays expandable cleaning log entries with status icons and colors based on the latest preprocessing logs.
frontend/src/components/ConfusionMatrixC: Renders a confusion matrix with validation, color scaling, and emotion label translation, showing empty states when data is invalid.
frontend/src/components/EmotionChart.tsx: Shows a static bar chart of emotion distribution using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/EmotionDistribut: Generates a pie chart and frequency table of emotion counts from documents, with dataset validation and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/EnsembleComparis: Visualizes ensemble model metrics in a radar chart, converting values to percentages and providing a custom tooltip.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GenderEmotionCha: Displays gender-based emotion distribution in a bar chart with loading and empty-state support.
frontend/src/components/GeoEmotionMap.ts: Displays a filtered geographic heatmap of emotions across valid Indonesian regions using intensity-based coloring and validation logic.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main navigation header with theme toggle, routing buttons, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/IntentionBrandCo: Shows a stacked bar chart of purchase intention levels (high/medium/low) per brand using fetched correlation data.
frontend/src/components/IntentionDemogra: Renders gender and regional demographic bar charts derived from purchase intention distribution values.
frontend/src/components/IntentionTrendCh: Builds a multi-line time‑series chart visualizing historical purchase intention trends grouped by intention level.
frontend/src/components/MarketingRadarCh: Generates a radar chart of marketing funnel metrics from document data with validation and fallback states.
frontend/src/components/ModelPerformance: Renders a bar chart comparing model precision, recall, and F1‑score with percentage conversion and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/PsychoSocialHeat: Computes and displays a psycho‑social heatmap from documents, validating matrix dimensions and showing fallback states when data is insufficient.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseIntentio: Displays a pie chart of purchase‑intention distribution using query data, with a simple no‑data fallback.
frontend/src/components/RecentAnalysis.t: Shows the five most recent documents with mock emotion analysis and badges for emotion and confidence.
frontend/src/components/TemporalEvolutio: Generates a line chart of emotion frequency over grouped time periods based on mock analysis.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, state tracking, and integration with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, uploading, deleting, and analyzing documents via an actor, with query invalidation and preprocessing steps.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and print-optimized report styling.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMetrics.ts: Computes marketing funnel metric scores from document text and aggregates them across documents.
frontend/src/lib/mockData.ts: Provides brand detection and mock emotion analysis utilities using simple keyword heuristics.
frontend/src/lib/psychoSocialMetrics.ts: Classifies emotion categories and computes psycho-social dimension scores for documents via keyword scoring.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReport.ts: Generates strategic report data by analyzing emotions, brands, psycho-social metrics, and marketing metrics from documents.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReportLocale.t: Defines bilingual UI labels and helpers for strategic report localization and priority labels.
frontend/src/lib/visualizationState.ts: Provides utilities for determining visualization state and sanitizing numeric or matrix-based chart data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Implements the emotion analysis page with document filtering, charts, and deletion handling.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Provides the main dashboard for text/file upload, dataset status, and navigation to analysis and metrics.
frontend/src/pages/MetricsPage.tsx: Renders model and ensemble performance metrics, confusion matrices, and dataset change notifications.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseIntentionPage: Renders a purchase intention dashboard with stats, charts, and loading states derived from intention data and uploaded documents.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI controls for configuring model selection, ensemble algorithm, thresholds, and saving settings.
frontend/src/pages/StrategicRecommendati: Generates and displays a strategic recommendation report from uploaded documents with locale switching, export, and print options.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, known issues, and implemented features related to dashboard visualizations and strategic reporting.
